passives.name: Lightshield Strike
passives.effects: Your next basic attack against a champion is empowered to {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for{{ft|{{as|{{critical damage|60|80}}|critical damage}} '''bonus''' damage|{{sti|{{as|80% '''total''' critical damage}}}}}}and {{tip|heal}} you for {{as|{{rd|100%|50%}} '''base''' AD}} {{as|(+ 6% of your '''missing''' health)}} (10 second cooldown per target). Excess healing beyond {{as|'''maximum''' health}} is converted to {{as|'''bonus''' health}} for 8 seconds.
